title: Hacked and customer service no help
review:
Update** Three days later and the hackers are still attempting to use my daughters account, despite our reporting to Current the issue, and changing passwords several times. I had to have my parent side of the account removed completely to stop the scammers from trying to deposit money from my end. The scammer also tried to scam my younger daughters card as well. Lucky for us she had ignored the calls/texts before anything happened. 
Original review: The card we have for our kids got compromised. The hackers/scammers were very smooth. Had all of us fooled. The company isn‚Äôt being very helpful at this moment about returning the money, either. And even after contacting them about the fraud, somehow these scammers are still trying to use my account to steal money through my kids‚Äô compromised account. I can‚Äôt remove the linked checking. Can‚Äôt pause it from making Deposits. It should only be allowing access via my Face ID, yet they still got in again. Looks like this is a new frequent issue for current users with these scammers yet no warning was sent out about this new scams. I  do NOT recommend anyone use Current cards for your kids. They need to do better about security and be better about returning fraudulently stolen money and about earning customers when new scams are on the rise. We‚Äôve been working with them for over two hours and there‚Äôs still no real resolution

title: Easy but not helpful
review:
Current is ok only reason I‚Äôm writing three stars is because customer service is honestly garbage. And they promote that there was $100 overdraft which honestly that‚Äôs not true at all.
But back to my original complaint about customer service I had an unauthorized use and someone used a little cash out of my account and when I contacted support they basically said it would take three to six months to get that payment back after I fill out a mountain of paperwork and all that they could do is cancel my card and send me another one, but in the process they canceled the wrong card so I was stuck out and they did not ship the new card faster they basically told me to deal with it or use another Bank to link a virtual card so I can pay for stuff for my kids .they were not helpful and honestly I won‚Äôt be with them for much longer .only good thing is you will get your paychecks faster and tax return fast but outside of that it‚Äôs really nothing good.
And if you change your phone number it is basically impossible for you to get back into your account even if you have an email link to it and they did nothing to help my wife she is still locked out of her current and the money is still sitting in there so basically they said deal with it so Hope this helps dudes

title: Not pleased
review: To first start out I‚Äôve had a bad experience with Current. This is my first debit card and I am not pleased with it at all. First things first I tried transferring money into the account and after about a week it never went through so I tried to dispute it and NEVER got my money back (this was months ago) so I decided to stop using it because after that I didn‚Äôt want to lose any more money. I‚Äôve finally decided to start using it again as I‚Äôm looking for a job and it‚Äôs currently the only debit card I have and I went to look at my account inform and Current has signed me out of my account on both of my phones. I‚Äôve tried signing back in but it literally makes me create a whole new account which I don‚Äôt want to do and the support email for current is no longer in use and I never reach anyone when calling. I don‚Äôt see anything about a sign in issue on the website and what to do if you can‚Äôt sign in at all so I have no clue what to do. There is literally no sign in option on the app only a ‚Äúget started‚Äù option as if to open a new banking account with Current. Are you really that desperate for new customers that you try to make them open up a new account if they can‚Äôt sign in to an existing one? I‚Äôve received no help from anyone despite trying and like I said never got my money back from the first time and now I can‚Äôt access my account. Do better
developerResponse: {'id': 19625747, 'body': "Hi, we're sorry to hear that and we would love to help you out. Please reach out to our customer support team at reviews@current.com. Sincerely, Support@Current\n\n", 'modified': '2020-12-08T17:15:29Z'}

title: Deceitful
review: We have been huge Current fans for the last couple of years. We‚Äôve recommended Current to countless friends and neighbors.  Until, my daughter received a fraudulent charge on her account. She notified Current within minutes, blocked her account and awaited her new card and a refund of her hard earned money. She received the new card and notice that Current did not agree with the dispute and that Current would not refund her money. I then spent 90 painful minutes typing away in their app (there is no phone service) being cut off several times if I wasn‚Äôt typing quickly enough, only to be again told that her $ would not be refunded and there was nothing I could do. So, I requested that all the money in our accounts be refunded and the accounts closed. I then spent another 30 min trying to withdraw my money to face constant ‚Äúerrors‚Äù. My very helpful ‚Äúchatbot‚Äù suggested I use the debit cards to withdraw the funds from an ATM - which would still leave Current with money in the bank since atms don‚Äôt give less than $20 and certainly not 50 cents. I am down to being owed $19+ (plus the bogus charges they allowed someone to steal from us) and will have my attorney follow up. My recommendation is to stay away from this operation.  All is well until it isn‚Äôt, and once it‚Äôs not, it unravels quickly.

We would be more than happy to look into the remaining balance you mentioned in your review & issue you a refund check for the amount remaining in your account. title: Do NOT bank with these crooks!
review: I had my card information used on a transaction and, at the time they were my financial institution. I locked my card and instantly contacted Current. To be told that I‚Äôd have to file a dispute which turned into a 6 month long battle. I have since switched banks to a regular big name. For $21 a month I was charged for them to take my money elsewhere. I canceled my account 81 days into the dispute. They had no idea when a ‚Äúdispute representative‚Äù would call me. Even after they said by end of day each day I contacted them. The phones route you to the app support which if they don‚Äôt want to answer a question they just end the chat and refuse to answer again. The best description for this bank is: if you like stressing out over why your funds are being taken, this bank is the bank for you. I have since found a stress free banking team at Citi Bank. Back to the 81 days into the dispute. At 101 days they email me saying the dispute was complete that they refunded the money. Now, after all that they won‚Äôt respond to my support emails asking to reactive to transfer my funds out. Go figure right? They have had to do this to others. They have got the science to screwing people down. Day three of waiting for a response on them letting me get my funds out, still no answer. They do not even deserve 1 Star!

title: The Current is Currently Perfect!
review: Funny true story. The payroll company that pays me uses a service that if I pay a fee they give me an advance on my paycheck. Well I signed up for it because the first time was free. Well when they go into the account to pull the funds to give me an advance they say I don‚Äôt have any money. Now I‚Äôm confused and a little upset but ChaChing here comes Currents notification! My finds are already available! You just know I had to tell that other company that they‚Äôre fixing to go out of business and some think that‚Äôs rude but I call it ‚Äúget your crap together, know that in these times you must stay on your toes because their will always be better!‚Äù Thank you Current I appreciate you! Please know there‚Äôs another one coming down the pike and the sooner I see it the better in these times you know we could all use it. God bless you thank you so much.I look forward to a long lasting business relationship with you. I love saying I love my Current because they are ahead of current and there is currently money in my account!

title: Needs work
review:
It‚Äôs a good app all together, I do have an issue with the customer service. It takes forever to connect to a representative & once you do it doesn‚Äôt notify you so the representative usually just ends the chat if you don‚Äôt respond in a few minutes so you have to wait all over again to finally get connected to a new one. Also, if you need to dispute a charge that also takes forever. 30-45 business days I believe which is normal but I should at least be able to get my money back before that especially if it was fraud.
I also don‚Äôt like the gas holds feature, say for example you only want to put 20 dollars in your tank & that‚Äôs all you have in your account, the gas station will try to charge you 100 bucks instead of 20. So it just declines at the pump and you have to pay on the inside.
If you want to go to a bank atm to withdraw money, the atm already has a 2-3 dollar fee since it‚Äôs a different bank, but on top of that this card charges you another 2-3 bucks so all in all your fee is 5.50 or something like that which is way too much. It‚Äôs just little things I have issues with but other than that like I said, it‚Äôs a good working app.

title: THIS APP IS ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE!
review: I wouldn‚Äôt even recommend this app even if someone held me hostage and forced me to. I never wanted to cuss out a customer service agent so bad. They are clueless and can‚Äôt do anything and clearly don‚Äôt know how to communicate with customers or each other. They give you a virtual card to use while your waiting on your physical one to arrive in the mail..what they don‚Äôt tell you is that you can‚Äôt even use it!!!! I tried to use my virtual card with the Apple Pay feature and it didn‚Äôt even work. I contacted customer support asking them if the virtual card works at any stores that accept Apple Pay and they told me that I can use my virtual card at any store I can have to accept ‚Äúcredit‚Äù instead of ‚Äúdebit‚Äù since my virtual card doesn‚Äôt have a pin. IT DID NOT WORK. Then I talk to someone else and they tell me that my virtual card is only accepted by merchants who accept virtual cards...after I just tried to use Apple Pay, with a merchant, WHO ACCEPTS VIRTUAL CARDS. I was so over it completely. THIS BANK WON‚ÄôT LET YOU DO ANYTHING WITHOUT YOUR PHYSICAL CARD. Mind you I ordered my card 7 days ago..and it‚Äôs still not here. This bank restricts you of YOUR MONEY. I am not able to access it in any way all because I don‚Äôt have the actual physical card. THIS APP IS A COMPLETE WASTE OF TIME. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK!

title: Don‚Äôt Waste Your Time.
review: If you want to have someone steal money from you through card fraud and have Current give you back the money and then take it back months later causing your account to be in debt because they all of a sudden decided there was no proof then this online bank is for you. If you would like to form a dispute with credible proof of scam tactics and it take months for them to dispute it even after the date they said it would be done then this online bank is for you. If you would like to have to wait in a hold without even being able to call anyone just talk to people on the app and have people close the conversation without getting you your help then this online bank is for you. Do you see where I am going with this? Do not let them try to butter you up with how much they seek to have to offer. It‚Äôs all fun until it gets down to the nitty gritty in which case they are very unreliable and have barely any communication skills. Your better off just getting Chime. I‚Äôm going to a brick and mortar bank, preferably Chase, so that I can have easy access to help whenever I need it and I can account for everything that I have. Don‚Äôt Waste Your Time. ‚ú®üïä

title: DO NOT MESS UP
review:
I was somewhat enjoying having the app as a teenager, but it was impossible to do anything without an adult supplying the money. Then once I turned 18 it locked me out until I could provide proper identification. I put in the wrong stuff and they locked me out permanently. I emailed them and they didn‚Äôt even respond to my question. I guess they have default responses when it detects certain words because I said ‚Äòinformation‚Äô maybe twice and the email back was about ‚Äúsorry you‚Äôre concerned with the information we take‚Äù. Um, what? Nice to know they don‚Äôt read it until the second email. So it took me 2-3 days to figure out I have to find a new application and there was nothing they could do for a mistake‚Äî‚Äîit took less time to receive appointment approval for a mammogram during COVID. You might think, oh can‚Äôt you make a new account? No. Never. You can only make an account via the app and you can only sign in with the same details after that so the apps useless on my phone now.

In conclusion: Don‚Äôt get it as a teenager unless you have someone willing to give you money, DO NOT mess up an ounce of information or you‚Äôll lose everything in your account, and expect your questions to take at least 72 hours for a proper response.

title: Do not get it!!!!
review: Get ready because your about to hear a long story as to why I gave this app and a very generous one star. Least start off by saying at first it was fine when using the teen account when my parent would send me money if your only going to use it for that your fine. But DO NOT i repeat DO NOT use it for direct deposit ITS TERRIBLE. I put money on my card and noticed that it was not showing up on my spending balance so I contact the support people. Mind you THEY HAVE NO PHONE LINE. It‚Äôs all through text. And they tell me that on their end it‚Äôs showing up that I have money on there. I explain to them I can‚Äôt purchase anything because it‚Äôs saying my balance is zero. they couldn‚Äôt do anything for me so I had to wait 3-4 DAYS. Thankfully it came but not in a timely manner. So I have them a second chance. I used direct deposit I got paid two days ago with still nothing in my account I gave them some time because Veterans Day was the other day. But today I decided to contact them to see what‚Äôs going on after 15 mins she tells me that my money arrived in another account HOW IN THE WORLD DID MY MONEY ARRIVE IN ANOTHER ACCOUNT. I only have one account so what other account is there.......... and that‚Äôs why you should NOT USE CURRENT FOR ANY DIRECT DEPOSITS OR ADDING MONEY

title: So far, so good
review: I was skeptical about Current at first because when I reached out to their customer service, the representative was very rude and didn‚Äôt answer my question so I left the chat. I decided to still give it a chance and set up my direct deposit. I received my first direct deposit from my second job today and it wasn‚Äôt deposited until 11:30AM. I was happy that I got paid two days early but I wasn‚Äôt happy about the late deposit. Nevertheless, the good part about Current is the fact that they send you balance updates when you make a purchase. The updates include the amount you spent and the remaining balance on your card. I also like that you can tap your card to pay. That‚Äôs a pretty cool, fast, and efficient feature as well. So far, I haven‚Äôt had any major issues with Current. I gave them 3 stars because of the late deposit and the rude customer service rep. I may come back and update my review over time if positive changes occur. So, as of now I would say give it a try. If you‚Äôre a skeptical and untrusting person like myself, you can take my review as a guidance for making the decision to create a bank account.

title: Horrible Customer Service
review: I have been locked out of my account for over a month, they say 24/7 chat availability but what good is that if your locked out of the app, I have sent multiple emails and have received zero helpful assistance, I have had no issues until now but since this has happened it‚Äôs cost me a large sum of money so that being said I would highly recommend a bank that you can contact atleast by phone and speak to a real customer service rep. Rather than Current‚Äôs automated call center and faulty mobile app as well as extremely slow and embarrassingly poor customer service assistance for a so called ‚ÄúBank!‚Äù I‚Äôm not one to complain but I rely on my checks weekly and when you have no access to control your funds for this long and no shown actions to assist your customer with a crucial issue, I felt the need to alert others that it‚Äôs obvious you have no concern for your customer‚Äôs needs, especially a ‚ÄúChoice Card Holder‚Äù You would think paying the extra for the better checking account might help get quicker assistance or any assistance period! I will absolutely be closing my primary account and will make sure to inform anyone interested in Current to look elsewhere for a more reliable banking option!

title: I still am suspended and I haven‚Äôt even used it.
review: I haven‚Äôt used the app fully or even at all all because I tried to make a new account for someone else on my phone and it wouldn‚Äôt let us and when I tried to sign in, it suspended me for suspicious activity. I STILL SEE YOU HAVING SOCIAL MEDIA INFLUENCERS GETTING SPONSORED TO ADVERTISE THIS WHEN YOU CANT EVEN RESPOND TO SIMPLE EMAILS OR DO ANYTHING TO HELP! You send generic emails that are all the same. Get customer service because a coffee shop and literally every other bank card has this figured out 100x better. I barely signed in for more than maybe a total of 5 minutes of use at most and ‚Äúsuspicious activity‚Äù is something a robot decided because I tried to make a new account for someone else on the same device! I still have your physical card too! Can‚Äôt use it. I‚Äôm sick of seeing the app on my phone and not ever getting an email response. Don‚Äôt bother using current. Read the reviews where people have no customer service because I rarely complain about anything let alone apps you can delete. I haven‚Äôt spent a dime or entered a dime into this account and I‚Äôm here to tell you to look elsewhere unless they can provide simple service.

title: Way better options
review:
Update: response from developer is that checks may take 3-5 business days to clear. I understand the policy. I don‚Äôt understand why it takes them 3-5 times longer than every other bank I‚Äôve ever dealt with either professionally or personally.

I‚Äôve banked with Simple for yrs but recently found out they would be closing. I found Current and thought it would be similar to Simple and set up an acct. I added money to my Current acct from my Simple acct which took around 5-6 days for the funds to be available for me to use. I then tried to use the photo check deposit. It took 4 days, 6 if you count the wknd, for my funds to become available to use. I don‚Äôt have the option to use direct deposit, because I work for a small business that doesn‚Äôt offer it as an option. Never in my life have I ever used or heard of a bank taking this long to make funds from a deposited check available for use. With Simple if I had my photo check deposit submitted before 4:00pm on Friday, my funds were available by 2:00am on Saturday. I guess the point of this is if you don‚Äôt mind waiting a week to have deposited funds available for use then this is the bank for you.

title: It‚Äôs great
review: For me the free atm is right by my old bank which was charging me hidden fees in the middle of this pandemic when I need my money more than ever. I decided to make the switch to current with little to no knowledge of it based on other people‚Äôs reviews I decided on current. It‚Äôs my first month using it I ordered my card in a Tuesday and received it the following Monday. So, not bad timing and they have a virtual card you can use in the meantime if you need your money now that works with Apple Pay if you need to use it in a store. There are somethings the virtual card doesn‚Äôt work for but it got me by until the hard one came. No hidden fees everything matches up, and they even allow overdraft up to a certain amount based on the individual and they fed my family one night and there is no overdraft fee just simply pay back what they allowed you to overdraft. I suggest it, very easy to use as well

title: THEFT
review: this service is ridiculous. my roommate ‚Äúbanks‚Äù with them and owed me money a couple months ago, she sent me the money from her bank account and current added my card to her account without any authorization. i have all my accounts at another bank and have NEVER banked with them or even heard of them. well fast forward a couple months after she sent me the money, every charge she was making with her card was coming out of mine. i had 300 dollars taken from me. we called current bank to ask what was going on and they said they had been having this issue and then said they‚Äôd fix it. they then had the audacity to ask if i wanted to bank with them after they essentially stole my card information ?? we said no and then told them we were going to be removing all the funds and banking somewhere else and then to NOT put her card on hold. 20 minutes later they call to confirm with us we wanted to put the card on hold, we then said for the second time we DIDNT want the card on hold and then the next day find out they put the card on hold anyways. this is an awful service and you are better off banking with a real bank.

title: Update
review: So i got a new phone, and i cant log in. i used current on my old phone and lost it, and used an tablet to use current. i deleted current off the tablet cause i thought it wouldn‚Äôt be that hard to log back in my account on my newer phone. and random subscriptions are coming off my card, that im not paying for anymore. i need to log back in on my new phone so i can hurry up and put my spending money in my savings, cause every time my mom sends me money i automatically pay for the subscriptions im not paying for anymore. that is why i dont like Current. UPDATE: I was able to log back in my current account on my laptop, but i‚Äôm still locked out on my phone. I try deleting the app and downloading it back but i‚Äôm stuck on the ‚Äúlink to parents account or invite your parent‚Äù screen. if you have anyway to fix this problem please let me know.

title: Customer service
review:
I have went online to contact Current thru email and the number provided. My work schedule conflicts with me getting to speak to a representative so I asked if I could be contacted before 12pm. Well they did one time after that I have not received any help trying to access my Current account or get a new card. I have asked repeatedly for assistance. I have stated to them that my son has also tried to access my acct because the number that was attached is no longer in service or he no longer has that number. It‚Äôs been over 2 weeks and I have yet received a response by email nor by phone call. I thought this was a good card and it‚Äôs seems to be but how when you can‚Äôt even get a Customer service agent to assist in getting you back into the app to request for a new card and update your information. I have sent over 10 emails I have called almost 10 times leaving messages for HELP. And guess what no response. Can Someone Please Help Me get back into my Current Acct.    
           Another week which makes 3 weeks and still no response by email nor by telephone.

title: Not recommend
review:
I decided to try this app because I have a teen with a job, and thought this would be a good way to start their ‚Äúbanking lessons‚Äù without the penalty of overdraft fees from an actual brick and mortar bank( Wells Fargo, bank of American...). From a distance this look great!
Not so much, you can not add cash to your teens card because it‚Äôs not allowed!?!? But then you can‚Äôt add cash to the parent side either your forced to link it to another bank. Customer support work around was to delete the app and then reinstall it. Which I did and nothing changed, Super annoying! 
When you transfer money from your actual bank to the current app it takes a full day to post even though it‚Äôs already cleared /deducted from my bank account.
Then when you mobile deposit a check (my teen‚Äôs payroll check to be specific) it takes 5 business days. Five days is a little ridiculous especially for a payroll check, and no where on the app does it tell you checks take 5 days to clear until after you endorse the back of the checkü§¨
Other then that it‚Äôs pretty user friendly, just not what I was expecting it to be.

title: Thank you mr beast
review: I have been with about 4 other cars like this also a few banks and I have never received anything from not one of the subscriptions. Right from the start with this account I was already been given some prizes for applying and out of the goodness of Mr. Beast heart he also gave me a present that helps out a lot for a single father.I‚Äôm not saying that you will receive the same things as I did but what I do know is that you will be well taken care of as an individual not just a number like the others. Thanks again  mr beast and current card.. so what are you waiting for sign up and start feeling Better about your finances.. I am not a paid actor or am I getting anything for taking the time out of my life to Wright a review. Just a regular dad that‚Äôs trying to make it through COVID-19 with  less stress about where my money is at. Every Dollar counts these days!!!!

title: Worst banking app EVER
review: I had my direct deposit set up on this app, I received it but it was pending and I googled it and said it would be several days so I reluctantly upgraded to premium, which still did not release my funds. It took about two days which wasn‚Äôt too bad. But now when I went to go use my card I can‚Äôt because they canceled it to send me my premium card... so now im going on day 5 with no access to my ENTIRE PAYCHECK. I‚Äôve tried hooking up to cashapp with the ‚Äúvirtual card‚Äù cashapp said they didn‚Äôt accept this. I tried paying someone through apple pay to try to get my money off, the app won‚Äôt let the payment go through. I have no way to pay my bills, no way to get myself gas or food, the money is just stuck o the account. Not to mention I tried to reach customer service and all they have is the chat option and the person did nothing to help me whatsoever. I tried routing the bank account to cashapp as well, does not work. Why would they cancel the card I have to send me the premium card???? I am stuck with no money and no way to get it out of the account. DO NOT DO IT.

title: Terrible Don't Use
review:
I been using current for maybe a week but within that week they have stolen 60$ from me then tell me i can verbally talk to anyone on the phone instead they end the chat on me and ignore everything i was asking them 
I'm still waiting for my 36$ bank transfer that i did literally the day after i activated my card then i tried to order food and it took off the payment twice and they are still holding my money. title: Don‚Äôt Understand The Bad Reviews
review: I Started using Current because it has the feature for adding another card for your Teen. I got him his own card that he got to design & he uses for his games an so on. I liked using Current so much that after 8 yrs with Amex Serve card I completely switched over to Current. U can Pause/ or UnPause your  card in seconds & even Block certain companies from taking any money. Plus my company pays us on Fridays but Current drops my Direct Deposit 3 days early. I Freakin Love the card, I have no idea why people give it bad reviews but it definitely deserves my 5 Star Approval. My Wifey & Daughter now use Current as well which they love due to the fact I can transfer them funds in seconds. It also seems that they are adding new & improved features all the time which is great!

title: Current card is not a good debit card
review: I would not recommend anyone to get connected with current due to the fact that money was withdrawn from my account without my consent and when I called customer service they basically told me that they couldn‚Äôt do anything about it that I will have to call to whoever took the money so they could put it back that they were unable to do it themselves that they would have to do an investigation within three days so that my money can be reimbursed back they talk about no hidden fees which they do have they talk about that they‚Äôre on able to do anything or give me my money back and it was not only the first time that it was done I definitely think that I will not give you no stars due to the fact that they never resolve my problem with returning the $110 that was taken from and every time you would do direct deposit they would take a percentage so the whole paycheck was not going through advice to everyone if you do not want to lose your money do not connect an account with current

title: Great for adults but the teen app is amazing!
review:
The developers did a great job with the feel and flow of the interface.  The Current debit card is also nice because it is NFC/Tao enabled - even the big banks haven‚Äôt been doing that until very recently.  
The teen app is even better than I expected it to be.  For my kiddo I was looking for something that functioned like a real checking account with an associated debit card.   The Current product does this and it‚Äôs software is amazing!   I can setup chore lists, my daughter can setup savings ‚Äúpods‚Äù for the things that she wants.  I can monitor all of her activities and even have the ability to restrict where she spends at.   
Great job on the app guys!  I look forward to watching your product and offerings grow.  It would be neat to be able to move ALL of my banking needs to you!

title: Current is the Bomb!
review: From The Virtual card that‚Äôs accessible from the app to use if yours comes up missing to the blocking features and the ability to build budgets and the ability to create savings accounts from the app, makes this card superior to almost every app based prepaid account that I‚Äôve used before! Plus their customer service call center goes over and beyond the standards for great customer care and issue resolutions that really does get resolved quickly and effectively without the struggle of constantly sitting on an annoying customer service caller waiting list for hours just for them not to pickup the phone for you anyways! They truly are remarkable and above average in comparison to others! Try them out and see!

title: Make funds available
review:
Having your funds deposited earlier is a good idea in theory but it‚Äôs pointless if you put a hold on the funds for a day or two making them unable to be used anyway. It defeats the purpose of you guys doing the deposit a few days earlier than expected...I will likely be closing my account as I shouldn‚Äôt have to wait days to be able to spend my money due to my funds being in my account but not being available to use every time I get a direct deposit

ETA: in response to the developer, even with other companies when a deposit is shown as pending it is still applied to your balance and the funds are made available for use, unlike with you guys. I shouldn‚Äôt be left stuck waiting and unable to use my fund from my paycheck for days, even when the deposit is put in my account a day or two earlier than the actual deposit date for my job. I also shouldn‚Äôt have to pay extra for a premium account just to be able to use my own funds sooner

title: Not Happy
review: I gave an initial rating however after 3 months of using I am not very happy. For the most part it is good but I do not like being ‚Äútricked‚Äù ‚Äúmislead‚Äù and that‚Äôs exactly how I am feeling very mislead!! I had a normal bank I was overdrawing and being charged crazy rates well Current comes along advertising we will cover you up to 100 dollars with 0 fee just be a prime member and get $500 plus monthly in direct deposits ‚Ä¶.. well here I am in month 3 with around $600 a WEEK in direct deposits guess what my over draft capabilities are? $25 dollars! Big help a whole $25 dollars they say they periodically review you for a updated amount I asked? When does that happen? Customer service didn‚Äôt know. Other than that it‚Äôs been a good card I‚Äôve even gotten  $50 added to my card from Mr Beast but I am very upset about being mislead about the overdraft because that‚Äôs what lured me to leave my bank and get this to begin with

Customer support is complete garbage they really couldn‚Äôt care less about whatever issue you call them about. They‚Äôre also supposed to give back instant gas withholds. developerResponse:
{'id': 21995091, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear about your experience with us. We understand how frustrating this must be & apologize for any confusion & inconvenience this may have caused. 

We try to be as transparent as possible in order to ensure our customers are satisfied with us, which is why do not state that you're always guaranteed the early direct deposits or maximum Overdrive limit. We state that your direct deposits may arrive up to 2 (or 5 for tax refunds) days early, but can arrive anywhere between those timeframes. We also state that qualified members may receive up to $100 in our overdraft feature, Overdrive. title: Fantastic!
review:
This has been a game changer for us. We have two teenagers and keeping up with their spending was a nightmare before Current. We can all send and receive money in an instant and in real time on this thing. They both started putting money in the savings pod offered on Current to save for big purchases. 
This app has a super affordable yearly fee, it‚Äôs easy to use, it always works and we‚Äôve not experienced any glitches in the service. I love that we can see every time they make a purchase or transfer, and we can block vendors where we don‚Äôt want them spending money. My older son is even paid by his fast food job on Current with direct deposit!  If you have teens who need a spending card with limits and oversights, this is the one for you!

title: Wish I could leave -6 stars
review:
This is the absolute worst app I‚Äôve ever used in my life for mobile banking. I‚Äôve been waiting MONTHS for a specific payment to be deposited into my account. Finally this deposit gets to my account and current DENIES IT and says that the information from the check doesn‚Äôt match the information on my account. Mind you, this payment is from
The GOVERNMENT. And the information on my account is the exact same information. Name, birthday, social #, address EVERYTHING. Also, I did not get a single notification from them about this issue, which would have been helpful so that I could have solved this problem right away. Now I have to wait 3 MORE DAYS to even contact anyone about it because of the weekend. Their customer service people do not help whatsoever, they aren‚Äôt even nice. Do not get any type of direct deposit sent to this useless app... you will regret it. 

Oh and if that isn‚Äôt enough to scare you away, they charge $5 for using an out of network ATM

title: Current- my two cents
review:
Current is an amazing mobile banking account that can definitely make banking SUPER simple. The savings pods are super nice but I believe there is only 3 pods (at the moment) I‚Äôd love to see upwards to like 10-15 pods. Just to diversify your savings. You can also round up purchases to your pods which is really nice. But it‚Äôs still not that known by other major services such as Experian. I tried to use Experian boost but Current was not available as a bank account. Maybe in the future. It‚Äôs overall a really good first bank for teens. 

Despite the MANY MANY MANY SCAMMERS on Instagram, it‚Äôs still a good bank. NEVER SHARE YOUR INFO WITH ANYONE NOT EVEN CURRENT THEMSELVES THEY ALREADY KNOW YOUR INFORMATION.

What I would LOVE to see is a current credit card. That would be AMAZING.

Getting paid up to 2 days faster is also nice because well who doesn‚Äôt like getting paid early? 

No gas holdings is really nice. 

Havnt tried to current rewards yet, don‚Äôt really plan to but if you‚Äôre into that go for it. 

You can talk to service reps directly through the app. 

You can cash checks with your phone which is also a really nice feature.

Overall 9/10 amazing bank.

title: Much more than a sleek design
review:
Let me first say that this is the most visually pleasing banking app I‚Äôve ever used.   The color schemes are reminiscent of neon lights in the darkness and the interactive facets of the design are smooth and perfectly responsive.  

It is so much more than aesthetics.   Early direct deposit with free overdraft, cash deposits at stores, fee free ATM‚Äôs, instantly refunded gas station holds, customizable savings pods, easily lockable virtual and physical cards, a unique cash back feature where you can buy cash for your account with points earned by swiping at stores  that have multipliers for money spent up to 8 times with an easy to use map to find where to get the most, free overdraft protection, a unique brand blocking feature, referral bonuses and spending tracking by category and brand, custodial accounts for your children and multiple budget builds make this banking app stand out in the crowd.  

55,000 free ATMs and no minimum balance are just the icing on the cake.   I would like to see an investing feature or crypto currency section in the future, but this app is at the head of the class already.    

Great job, Current.

It was good before my son was eligible for a debit card. Some places wouldn‚Äôt accept it because they consider it a prepaid card. I waited for 30 minutes and was still 10th in line. No reminder of renewal so beware!!! My husband couldn‚Äôt have access because you have to provide your Ss# and we didn‚Äôt want to give this place so much personal info. They have direct access to my bank because I was giving my son money so they have no incentive to quit charging my annual fee. 

I am now changing to a 1 star. I have been trying over a month to cancel. I was charged another annual fee. The only response I ever get is to ask why but no actual help. I have told at least 5 times why. Next week I will file a BBB complaint.

title: Poor Customer Service
review: This card service does not offer 24-hour support like they say they do. They use a chatbot to communicate with its customers. It‚Äôs very hard to get in contact with a live representative. I have been trying to get in contact with a live representative to get my card unlocked do to their fraud protection plan. My card has been locked for almost three weeks and I only heard from a live representative once. The representative told me to give them 72 hours to unlock my card but when 72 hours came my card was still locked. I tried contacting them through the app, email, and phone number and I‚Äôve had no luck. This company is very unprofessional.  They offer a number to call but every time you call no one answers and the automated answer system keeps redirecting me to go to the app to talk to the chat bot. DO NOT open an account with this company.

title: Horrible
review: I been using them for almost two years and I am not satisfied at all with them. I don‚Äôt even qualify for the overdrive program that they have been advertising for new customers due to not being ‚Äúselected‚Äù at the time. I have filed two disputes with them and lost both even though I submitted plenty of proof that I never received my goods I purchased ALSO whenever I instantly deposit funds from cash app they do not reflect immediately, I get it 3 or 4 days later!!!! When I ask why that is I get told that the funds aren‚Äôt on their end and they can not release the funds to me!! I don‚Äôt even get paid 2 days early anymore which was the point of me having this card . Customer service is rude and not helpful , they end the chat or are rude to you whenever you ask a question. This company is a joke and I will be taking my business elsewhere!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 19811482, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear about your experience and would be happy to look into this further. Please reach out to our customer support team at reviews@current.com so that we can assist you. Sincerely, Support@Current", 'modified': '2020-12-16T17:40:30Z'}

title: So good
review:
I've been with current for a few months now and they're really good. 

Pros: early direct deposit, can create multiple savings inside, can pause your card anytime and even use a VIRTUAL card, can block brands so they won't charge your account (useful for subscriptions), they even make you feel happy about the littlest things. "Hurray your direct deposit has arrived!" 

Cons: has verification problems when logging into different devices, long wait for customer support, can't call only online chat, and if you can't bypass the phone number verification you have to contact support somehow only. There's more good and bad  but i don't want to make it seem like it's bad because it's not.

title: Amazing & Good for Saving & Cashback!
review: It's amazing! They have taken a lot of time with the design of this app. Saving categories, spending and categories are involved. What makes this app special to me is that it's easy to navigate around, support is quick and handy, and you get cashback for Everytime you swipe with your card! You get points added up at places when you spend so no need to feel like there's a whole burning in your pocket because it's getting snowed back up with Current! I have premium and the benefits are definitely worth getting money two days later. Transferring money takes 1-2 days. It's awesome I swear.

title: Customer Service and Protection
review: Don‚Äôt get scammed if you‚Äôre using Current you will not get your money back no matter how much proof you have I was scammed out of $1500 provided so much proof that it was a scam and waited several months just to get my dispute denied, and you can‚Äôt reopen the case either. My second complaint is once I left Current I had a deposit sent to the closed account by accident I‚Äôve been emailing customer support to get my money out of the closed account for the past 4 days with no response when it clearly says we typically respond in 24 HOURS!! Lastly calling the Current customer support is pointless you don‚Äôt get to talk to anyone just a bot reading a menu to you telling you to use chat. I suggest SoFi, Chime, or Oxygen. Current just isn‚Äôt quite there yet when it comes to customer support or protection.

title: I‚Äôm convinced
review: I was a little hesitant to open this account. I mean who banks with a bank that you only hear about from an app commercial, right. Well I‚Äôm convinced. I get my direct deposit 2 days faster. It cool because it‚Äôs not my entire paycheck, just some back up money to hold me over until Friday. Also the ease of setting up the ‚Äúsavings pod‚Äù is great, they round up all your purchases to the dollar and move it to your pod. Pretty good stuff the only thing I wasn‚Äôt crazy about was the policy that your first deposit cannot be a personal check. I guess they are protecting themselves from the rubber balls lol.

title: No money without a physical card
review: I received this account back last week . I‚Äôve had money in my account since Monday it would let me send myself money or Apple Pay myself with the virtual card. So I said let me send money to my BOA account that was last night and it still not available. This card is trash . Especially the way the mail has been running in the US . Please don‚Äôt get this card I‚Äôm in dyer need of cash right now. I can‚Äôt even touch my money . This is soo frustrating I‚Äôve never seen a card like this a least you guys could put a fee with the virtual card so that people can access their money some type of way. Don‚Äôt think that if someone you knows have current then you can access it that way you can‚Äôt until you receive your physical card and no telling how long this will be. Please Don‚Äôt Use Current EVER .

However, you aren't able to fully utilize your account's features with your virtual card for security purposes. Please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address associated with your account for help! \nSincerely, \nSupport@Current", 'modified': '2021-03-16T21:58:29Z'}

title: üòê
review: I‚Äôve been using current for a couple of months now and the only problem I have is that my card has been in review twice now. The fact of the problem is I had no suspicious activity for the first time and my card was under review over a week, it shouldn‚Äôt take over a week to review someone‚Äôs card, at that time leaving me unable to pay pills and etc. I had to call the bank that actually issues the card, just to get them to yall to finish my review. This time I can‚Äôt even open the app to see if my taxes came through or my check. When I try and call customer service it goes straight to voice mail, you‚Äôd think you should be able to talk to someone if you‚Äôre money is being withheld, can I Atleast get a notice that my card is being reviewed.

title: Currently current!!!
review: This card is alright for now I've heard some serious issues happening with the way things get done with customer service i am curious to see for myself to see how things get done.  I have a couple of issues being handled with the customer service department . I don‚Äôt like not being able to speak directly to a agent or human when dealing with a issue you have to chat üí¨ with a bot ! They are willing to help but not live! However they do there best to help you! I do like the perks of the  virtual card can come in handy! Overall this card is somewhat of an asset to have in your wallet.

title: Lured with false promises
review: This is the first app review I am leaving because these people ruined my day. I was just trying to enter a sweepstakes, then found out that the rules of the sweepstakes were neither clear nor encompassing of what is required. My mom is a lawyer and I just got my math degree, so I am very good at logic and implications and there was nothing in the rules stipulating what ended up being needed. The customer service then said I had misunderstood and that the sweepstakes is only for existing members with a physical card, which made no sense. And was all around unhelpful. They even told me my account was made yesterday even though I had made it that morning (and got so fed up with it, that the account was ended the day it started). Don‚Äôt be tricked into getting this, and if you are and want customer service, be ready to essentially talk to a brick wall.
developerResponse: {'id': 23251584, 'body': "Hi there, thanks for leaving a review & we're sorry to hear about this! We would be more than happy to look into what went wrong here & answer any questions or concerns you may have about the sweepstakes you're referring to. If you still need assistance, please reach out to us at reviews@current.com from the email address that was associated with your account. \n\nWe hope to hear from you soon so that we can make this right! ", 'modified': '2021-06-08T01:14:51Z'}

title: It‚Äôs okay. Could be better.
review: I have to say I was initially very happy with current but since the last update I‚Äôve noticed some really bad changes. Example I used to get my paychecks deposited on Wednesday now it‚Äôs Thursday. And I used to get instant money transfers now they‚Äôre holding transfers for 5 days and it says I have to earn instant transfers? What? I already had them and now I don‚Äôt? Why? Also I‚Äôm not happy with the earning money back feature because you have to allow current to access your location at all times to gain the money back benefits. Having the navigation on ‚Äúalways‚Äù kills my battery. I would really like to see the option to have location tracking on ‚Äúonly while using‚Äù.

title: Don‚Äôt use this card
review: My card has been locked for more than 2 weeks and I emailed over 10 times you can‚Äôt call them once it‚Äôs locked it just hangs up on you you can‚Äôt call at all they tell you to email someone finally got back to me 2 days ago basically telling me if they need anything else from me they will tell me iv asked over and over to close this account and send my money in a check and that‚Äôs the response I got ??? What do you need from me ? my deposit from work has been sitting there for a whole 2 weeks and no one will unlock my account or CLOSE MY ACCOUNT LIKE I ASKED they barley respond do not use this service if you need help you won‚Äôt get it if you ask to close out your account they will ignore you and just keep your money on the card but respond on the app‚Äôs review page but not customer service

title: Love it!
review: The only issue I have is putting cash In my account, other than that I have only had one issue in the 6 months I‚Äôve had it and when I logged into the app to see what happened I got a message that linked me to an customer rep through text that fixed my issue in under 20 seconds. I also have a 12 year old that has her own card on my account and transferring money to it is so easy and takes 5 seconds and is transferred instantly and I can control how it‚Äôs spent if you want or I can transfer it to a savings pod that we set up. I love this company!

title: Customer service
review: I've been using current for quite some time now but the customer service lacks tremendously my card info was hacked and used and my account was used in total about 250 dollars for website membership that I had no recollection of. They put a claim I waited for their response the refunded me two out of the 5 claims I put in and denied the other three. When I tried to call and find out a bot threw the chat said check my email for my answer never received a email when I tried to dispute it again the closed it out so I lost out on more than 100 bucks with no real explanation for charges I never authorized.  Current gave away my hard earned money and I still continue to use them in hopes that one day I will get my money back

title: Stressful
review:
I love how simple and user-friendly this banking app is. I loved it so much that I completely switched over from another bank. But the spending limit has gotten me into some really difficult situations. The daily limit is only $2000. On a day-to-day basis, this is fine. But I have bills and tuition to pay. It is absolutely devastating when you‚Äôre in the middle of a busy day after paying loads of bills and you hit the limit trying to buy groceries or dinner. And there‚Äôs nothing the support team will/can do to help.

Like I said, I love the app. But I‚Äôm seriously considering closing my account because of how much stress this has added to my life. 

My only other complaint is with the mobile check deposits. It always takes 5-7 days for them to process a mobile deposit. My last bank took 3 days max, and they would forward you $300 of the check until the full amount processed. Not all employers offer direct deposit! 

Honestly I‚Äôm already on the hunt for a new bank. I don‚Äôt need all of this extra stress. Some little part of me is still hoping they‚Äôll make some changes though, because I really do enjoy the platform.
developerResponse:
{'id': 23251387, 'body': "Hey there, thanks for taking the time to leave us a review & we're sorry to hear about your experience with us! Although your spending limit for purchases made with your card is $2000, you also have a daily ATM limit that is $500. If you don't need to withdraw cash for the day, the additional $500 can also go toward your $2000 limit for a total Daily Spending Limit of $2500.

For bills & other payments, you can always link your account & routing numbers to have them withdraw the funds directly out of your checking account. These payments will appear as ACH withdrawals & will not apply towards your Daily Spending Limit. 

As for our mobile check deposit feature, your funds should settle between 3-5 business days & shouldn't take up to 7 business days to be made available. If this is a recurring issue, we would be more than happy to look into this! 

We're constantly working to improve the products & services we offer & your feedback/suggestions are incredibly important to us! 

If you have any other questions, concerns, or additional feedback, please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account. We hope to hear from you soon! ", 'modified': '2021-06-08T00:54:13Z'}

title: Used to be a great card
review: I used to love this card for my 2 sons. I was able to  track their spending, give them money for jobs, had automatic deposits for allowance. Things were great. Unfortunately despite me trying to block a certain merchant the charges still kept going through and I would get notifications that a card was declined. Now I no longer have access to instant deposits. It‚Äôs very frustrating. Why would I want to wait 2-3 days? I need the piece of mind that I can send money to my children instantly, when they need it. Customer service also was not helpful. Never said instant deposits would return, said they had no control over it. You should format your app better to deal with customer issues if that is the case.

title: Still happy with this card
review: I wrote a review shortly after getting my Current account. I felt I should update anyone considering this card on my thoughts about it.I have had it a few months and I‚Äôm still very pleased with their service. Anytime I‚Äôve had questions or concerns in regards to my account I have received fast, friendly and thorough help. I‚Äôve never had difficulty receiving a response right away. You do need to give them a moment to review your account depending on the situation you have. I‚Äôm a relatively impatient person, and I am nothing but pleased with this service.

title: Has potential to forever change the banking game.
review: So this is my first bank account and I have to say this was easy as 123. Many banks require a sit down interaction to have an account opened up. Current makes it fast to open up and is very on top of their game. I received my card in 2 days! Current is a legit bank and is honestly the best online one. If current can keep their customer satisfaction up, they have the potential of becoming the biggest banking platform in the nation. Current makes life so much easier as well as provides many benefits.

title: Money is not safe & terrible customer service
review: Do not waste your time with this terrible app. I set up my account had fraud happen 2 days later I had not even receive a card yet and I get a notification of someone trying to use it. I reach out their useless customer department. Who told me they do not care and can‚Äôt do anything about it until the 15th to give the card more time to arrive. Clearly the card is not coming because it was stolen! Teresedad the customer service rep did nothing to help. She refused to understand or do anything. I was so mad that I told her I want to delete my account. She was quick to let me delete the account. What a waste of time. I am going to get apple to refund the money I paid for the app. Do not waste your time, money, or effort with this app. Your money is not safe. Beware!
developerResponse: {'id': 23251458, 'body': "Hi there, thanks for taking the time to leave us a review & we're terribly sorry to hear about your experience with our customer support team. We want to make this right & we'd be more than happy to look into your previous interactions with our agents & answer any questions/concerns you may have. \n\nPlease contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account. We look forward to hearing back from you! ", 'modified': '2021-06-08T01:02:36Z'}

title: Where‚Äôs my money
review:
On July 9th,2020 I tried to withdraw $500 from an ATM that‚Äôs linked to the app that‚Äôs free of charge. 
And as I was doing so the atm displayed an error message and did not dispense my money.  So I filed a dispute. I figured since I used an ATM linked to the app it be no issue and it would be solved quickly. Well it‚Äôs now November 24th. And I still have not received anything, no updates from the ‚Äúdispute team‚Äù somehow the customer service can‚Äôt ever get a response from them. And you can‚Äôt even call these people. Due to covid reason that‚Äôs just an excuse. Can‚Äôt they work from home just like every other bank in the world is doing!? And every time I chat with someone I get the same response. They will email me with an update on my dispute. Which I never get. This is ridiculous. I‚Äôm starting to regret opening this account.

title: Horrible
review: This is the worst customer service I have ever received. Nobody seems to be able to help me. I have reached out several times regarding a pending amount due to a decline for a purchase for insufficient funds (even though there was enough money in my account to cover the purchase), and nobody seems to be able to assist me. I want to know why the amount is still pending. I also want to know why it takes so long for money that I transfer from my other bank to be available. The customer service is absolutely horrible and I will be closing this account. The only reason a gave you one star is because I couldn‚Äôt write this review otherwise. Shame on you for misleading yet another consumer! You deserve zero stars just based on the customer service alone.
developerResponse:
{'id': 22132297, 'body': "Hi there, thanks for leaving an honest review & we apologize for your experience with our customer support team. 

Regarding the pending charges, it can take anywhere between 10-15 business days for those to reverse back into your account, as this is dependent on when the merchant has reversed the funds.  For transfers from a funding source to your Current account, those can take 3-5 business days to deposit into your account as they have to go through the ACH network before they arrive into your account.  These are fairly standard time frames across most financial institutions & other mobile banks. 

We understand the importance of customer service, especially when it comes to your personal finances & we strive to provide top quality service in a seamless & efficient way. However, it sounds like we've failed to do that for you & we are terribly sorry about this. We'd like the chance to look into what went wrong here & how we can best assist you moving forward. 

Please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account & let us know if you have any questions or concerns. 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-04-08T18:30:26Z'}

title: Locked out of account
review: I have been locked out of my account and unable to use my funds for the last 3 days! I recently changed my number. And phone I don‚Äôt have access to the last number ! When logging into my account it gives you the option  to log in with email I select that and it‚Äôs still asking me to verify the number I do not have access too! I have sent multiple emails and lef voice messages over 10 times and I still haven‚Äôt gotten a reply the funds are in my saving accounts so I need to get access to transfer ! Something so simple is leaving a very bad taste in my mouth and I‚Äôm sure after gaining access to my account I am moving all my funds to a different account cuz this doesn‚Äôt make any sense ! I have haven‚Äôt got access and my funds are being held from me

title: So far, so good!
review: I just wish they could be a bit more transparent with card advertising, what they advertise is the premium membership which will cost you a mere $4.99 a month. What I started off with was the basic membership that is free. I have no problem with the basic membership, but the premium membership is what they advertise EVERYWHERE I‚Äôve seen. Again, I have no negative comments about the app or the company, I am only saying I wish there was more transparency with what membership you will likely sign up for when you get your account with current üòÅ

title: Current Rocks My Boat!
review: I have tried quite a few mobile banking options, and hands down, Current is the best in every way. First, in app customer support. No email or phone number for contact (though these are available as well). You can actually speak to a helpful agent in real time as easy as texting a friend. The interface is stunning ‚Äî no outdated clunky design. You have the ability to pause your virtual card or your debit card and easily turn it back on. I could go on. I‚Äôve found my new home bank. Thank you, Current!

title: Okay!
review: Okay so don‚Äôt get me wrong I love this app. I get paid a day sooner. But it‚Äôs some flaws. I‚Äôm unable to get the feature of the $100 overdraft, maybe because when I started they didn‚Äôt have that feature? But I don‚Äôt find that fair if I‚Äôve been a loyal supporter and I‚Äôm unable to use that feature. Plus I‚Äôve been waiting since August for my refund since someone got into my account and took out money. It‚Äôs about to be a new year and no one has helped me out. Which is stupid cause it‚Äôs only suppose to take 90 days. I‚Äôm kind of over it if you ask me.

title: I love this bank
review: This bank is by far in the top five in my opinion, you get paid up to 2 days early, if you have kids you can open up an account like an allowance for them to use or save if necessary. I love the fact that you don‚Äôt have to block out the whole entire card from any transactions but if you don‚Äôt want a certain transaction to come out you can block out that specific merchant to put a stop a payment. I definitely recommend it to anyone who needs a good bank account for them and their kids.

title: Actually Great
review: I‚Äôve been a current premium customer for years and can honestly say I‚Äôve never had any issues with them , There customer service responds fast and there 24/7 , You actually do get paid 3 days early not two as advertised , Card works everywhere the design in the app and the card looks good I actually use it as a bank only problem that I do have is it has a daily spending limit of 2,000 dollars that‚Äôs the ONLY bad thing about this bank it doesn‚Äôt let you update it neither for sum reason

title: Love+A Tip
review: This app has a lot of good ground and started off with such an easy platform to do so with. As it grows and adds more improvements to its systems I‚Äôm really enjoying the growth. Which brings me to my tip and idea. But adding easy ways to grow our own income throughout your financially system and help to generate income on a potentially significant level. Might be too big for most ‚Äúglass half full/half empty people‚Äù but for us ‚Äúit‚Äôs a glass with water‚Äù thinkers.  Could be a good move forward. Thanks for the continued updates and making this app actually worth the download. üòáü•∞

title: Meant for children I guess?
review:
As an adult, this account just didn‚Äôt work for me. 
I see people raving that it‚Äôs good to fund their kids‚Äô allowance.
 I signed up for the premium account, which is $4.99 a month. 
You can waive that fee by spending $500 first ONLY in specific places on the map provided (which demands to track your precise location in order to work AlWAYS). You collect points when you spend at specific locations, then you can ‚Äúbuy‚Äù the option for a month free. 

No interest if you decide to use savings pod. (I personally didn‚Äôt expect this feature but just in case anyone was wondering.

But the biggest problem I have with the app is the $3.50 to reload. Whaaaaat the heck is the point of the card? I might as well buy gift cards. Since it‚Äôs loaded through vanilla? 

MOBILE check deposit? NO. Don‚Äôt do it. I made a mobile deposit with a small amount first just in case and I‚Äôm glad I did so. The estimated clear date was extended one day. They lag and I have a feeling it‚Äôs on purpose. I mean god forbid a $7 check were to be wrongfully deposited. 

Support really has never answered my questions or helped me in any way whenever I ask.

title: DO  NOT USE CURRENT
review: I got current for my teenage daughter. Thought it would be a great tool to teach my teenage daughter about money. We used the card for about 6 months, I cancelled it because it just wasn‚Äôt working for us. Fast forward to over a year later, I get a fraudulent charge of $250 taken out of my bank account from Current. I got in touch with current and they were of absolutely no help. They would not refund my money and I could  never even talk with a real person. I hadn‚Äôt been on the app for over a year, current card had been shredded and they were of no help in correcting the situation. STAY AWAY FROM THIS COMPANY they have no customer service and they do not care that that the lack of security on there side is causing issues to their current and past customers!

title: üëéüèæ
review: 1st off I knew nothing about Current til I had a friend tell me about it... In the beginning I was only using this card with my cash app... Then I decided to have half my paycheck set up direct deposit so that  I could get paid 2 days early.. Not the case I received a notification on a Wednesday night round 8:16pm saying that my direct deposit had hit my account that was good to know being I needed to get some medicine... Well I checked my account and the money that was deposited was now pending in my account... I still couldn‚Äôt get any money because it wasn‚Äôt available to withdraw... When it did come thru it was that Thursday night... So I still didn‚Äôt make a withdrawal til my actual payday that Friday... I refuse to sign up for the premium... today I will be unlinking my direct deposit...

title: True to what they Promise‚ú®üò≠
review: With only a fee of only $4.99 a month, I received a premium checking account card and my check came two days early as promised!!! I LOVVEEE the fact that I can earn and redeem points from buying food and shopping to receive even more money on my card! I‚Äôm not gonna lie I heard about Current from a group of amazing YouTubers (RDCWorld) and I was at first hesitant to try it but I really needed a new card that wasn‚Äôt prepaid from my job and gave me problems like my old one. BUT I DO NOT REGRET MY DECISION AT ALL!!!‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è I recommend it‚ù§Ô∏è‚ú®

title: 4-5 months later into a dispute and still waiting
review: Started off as a good banking option until $675 was taken out of my account and when I realized it not even a minute after the charge appeared on my account and alerted me, I tried to reach out to customer service which is only thru text messages.. Now here it is November 20th and I still haven‚Äôt received my funds back and everytime I try to contact the customer support all I get is that they will email the dispute team because after they make the file, is out of their hands.. Not to mention when they send you a new card you have no access to your money until you receive your new card almost 2 weeks later..

title: Some issues but overall I like them
review: Super easy banking and good for now, however I had an issue with some money that got taken out of my account for a membership that was never paid. I was in contact with both the current bank and my other membership and neither of them could figure out where the money went so they basically told me there was no error and my money is just gone. The help was incredibly minimal on their end and I still have not solved this solution. Overall I don‚Äôt mind the banking itself just the customer service.

title: Bad customer service
review: Current has a great model. App and service did work fine. Now app is telling me to reverify my bank. Then it comes up and says my bank has already been been reverifed but still won‚Äôt allow instant deposit. The chat to reach what should be customer service is a joke (if you need to chat with them be sure you take a toothbrush and a change of clothes). You stay on chat for hours and then no one knows what they are doing. Then the developers ask for feedback for the app and limit the characters to about less than 3 normal sentences!! My issue still isn‚Äôt resolved, but I don‚Äôt have another 2 hours to spend waiting for a non-trained chat rep to come on the chat session. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this app or company to a dog to use.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16153212, 'body': 'We regret to note this. Please contact us at reviews@current.com with your contact details so that we can address your concern. 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current

', 'modified': '2020-06-22T22:10:51Z'}

title: Thanks to Mr. Beast & the Current Team!
review:
I‚Äôm seriously excited to put this opportunity and genius & completely beneficial App to use! From my everyday work, bills, investments, family priorities and important obligations. This beats Chime and other bank apps by light years! 
Got my fingers crossed I win any of the Mr. Beast prizes to sweeten this amazing choice! God knows it would help immensely on so many levels and many ways. 
Highly recommend taking those few minutes to start the process and change to a better and wiser way of investing and managing.

title: Good Luck
review:
I signed up for a free trial after a friend told me to check it out. I decided they were ok but decided to cancel on Jan 2nd. I emailed support and was asked why and to email again to cancel my account. I then emailed again and said I‚Äôm not interested and want to close my account. I was told I‚Äôd receive an email in 24-72 hours. Today I was charged a fee of $4.99 on my other bank account I linked. I opened the app and did a chat. The rep closed my account and said I had to request a refund after the charge posted in 3-5 business days. I then was kicked off the app as my account was closed so I can‚Äôt even chat with support. 

This fee was taken after 4 emails requesting my account be closed. I would like it refunded now and not have to fight for it in a week!!

title: Horrible!
review: Do not bank with them they are a fraudulent company, several people have complained about their money being stolen from their account and one person even threatened by an employee. My personal experience, they are very unprofessional, there is no contact information other than the customer service number that they do not answer at all. They locked my card and did not tell me anything i have been trying to contact them for a week now and have gotten no response even tried reaching out to the founder stuart sopp and got no reply but a friend request on twitter from the banks social media page , the banks page told me to dm them with my issue and never responded. Please save yourself a headache and do drugs before you ever decide to bank with this branch.

title: Keep your Money!
review: I don‚Äôt know how this app has so many great reviews. Capital one didn‚Äôt even want me to work with these people. The verification process Plaid is not up to par with their standards and your information is not safe. I‚Äôd rather keep my money in a couch before letting these incompetent  people deal with my money. As other customers explained their customer service (if you can even call it that) amazes me by the lack of help they give you. Chatters use just the information that is already provided in the website. They obviously can‚Äôt even think for themselves. If they can‚Äôt answer your question they just quote that over and over without helping. Good luck, I‚Äôd recommend switching to green dot or even chime...Even cash app at this point.

title: Nice App, Great Ideas, Worlds Worst Bank Customer Service
review: I really want to like Current and if I had never had to speak with support this would be a five star review. If you choose to use this app be forewarned that they are according to them unable to perform basic banking support that Chime, Level, and One Finance have all been able to provide for me. Also should you make the mistake of paying for premium and then change your mind they cancel your debit card and mail you a new on in 10-12 business days. If you like copy and paste responses from chat support Current is the bank to choose if you want a real bank that is able to provide real customer support  choose literally any other bank including the three I already mentioned.

title: Not helpful
review: Im giving it one star because first off they false advertise the ‚Äúfree overdraft‚Äù, secondly the people on app support are really not helpful at all and it doesn‚Äôt make any sense that when you call the number you can‚Äôt even talk to a real person. Lastly this whole app or whatever seems useless if they cant do simple things like cancel payments, dispute charges or putting you in contact with someone who can actually HELP. I‚Äôll be finding another bank b/c current is not the way to go worse than cashapp:

title: Incredible Service for Online Banking!
review: Current is easily the most streamlined and well-designed banking app that I have ever seen, let alone used. The functions within the app are all placed well and functions quickly and just as you would expect them to work. The design makes for easy money transfers and the ability to link PayPal and other services such as Chime and my business accounts only serve to distill further in my mind that Current is the superior application for online mobile banking.

title: wow i‚Äôm so disappointed
review: the catch to getting paid two days earlier is to become a premium card holder which costs a fee! My account was breached and $132 was taken out of my account . I filed a dispute and submitted the paperwork to support my claim , I submitted my claim back in August. I was told the investigation process could take up to 90 days which it did . Nobody every reached out to me , I kept chatting with support (no direct line to call) to figure out the status of my dispute. Just yesterday as i reached out again much after the 90 day period i was informed my dispute case was close and the amount was not credited back to my account. After waiting more than 5 months, constantly reaching out i finally got a direct answer. Very disappointed in this company

title: Customer Service is a joke!
review: I‚Äôve been trying to dispute a charge now for 3 days and no one has gotten back to me via email as promised! The first 2 attempts were a joke bc the reps Rob and Essa were somehow amused with my inquiries and purposely had me on hold for about 15 mins before they ended my session rudely, without telling me anything. Almost as if they were joking with each other!!! This is absolutely ridiculous! Why is there a phone number for this company when it only lures and directs you to chat with customer service through the app instead to speaking to a rep? I have been with this company for a little over a year now and I think it‚Äôs time to end my relationship with them. The representatives via chat are classless and lack empathy! I‚Äôm livid! To Chime I go!

title: Lost in a financial world full of scams and traps
review: In 2021 there are plenty of options to choose from when it comes to an online bank! But during these tough times being on unemployment means you need to either go with the debit card the state send you or choose a larger bank with Current I can receive my unemployment benefits a day faster than I would with the state debit card and two days faster for federal. That aside it allows me to overdraft if I need to! This app is incredible I‚Äôm very glad I found it

title: Current
review: Current is way better than I thought it was going to be. In many cases it‚Äôs even better than the primary banks we use. Thank you current for having great service. Current makes it easier for us to take control of our finances. Current makes me feel comfortable with using them as a bank. They don‚Äôt make you feel like a child that gets an allowance when our job and our bank feels like we deserve it. Current let‚Äôs it be known that ‚ÄúIT‚ÄôS OUR MONEY, AND NOT ONLY DO WE NEED IT NOW, BUT WE NEED IT NOW‚Äù! THANK YOU CURRENT YOU ROCK!

title: Current
review: If you don‚Äôt have a current bank account, What are you doing? Make your funds easier to spend with sorting your budget out on the App! Use your Virtually card when you leave your physical card at home or even when it‚Äôs lost it all works when your with Current it‚Äôs a Win Win situation!!! Bank with Current NOW!!!! Oh, Did you say you don‚Äôt have enough?? Thanks to current they give you a free overdrive everything is alright with current! Get your Current Card Now!

title: Useless.
review:
I downloaded this app in the hope that I‚Äôd be able to quickly transfer money to our son.  He downloaded the app too, we both got cards, and I paid the $36 annual fee for the service.  

It took five business days for my initial deposit to settle into my account, which I expected.  What I didn‚Äôt expect was that, despite the funds showing as settled and available, it would take yet more days to transfer that money from my Current account to his.  Being accustomed to  the speed of Venmo, this all seemed pretty ridiculous.

I think I‚Äôve contacted customer service ten times about this issue, and no one seems to even understand what I‚Äôm talking about.  Customer service consistently gave advice ranging from clueless, to straight up wrong. Their own website says this:

‚Äú...if you maintain a balance on Current as a parent, you can avoid waiting for additional deposits by transferring settled funds from your balance to your teens instantly.‚Äù

Uh, not so much.  Not for me, at least.  

Hope we have better luck with the Venmo card - probably couldn‚Äôt be worse than our experience with Current.

title: Need help getting into my account
review: Hello , I would normally rate this app 5 starts because I just love this bank so much .
