I will rate the app 5 stars when this is resolved . Please help me get back into my account , I can‚Äôt use any of the money because I‚Äôve locked my card as well . Thank you

title: Good Online Checking Account
review: Has worked really well for me so far as a alternative & Secondary personal checking account whereas there is no branch access in the location travel and work out of for the foreseeable future. only downsides so far is there is no linking to online sites via Plaid for bill pay or bonuses etc and if you have issues logging into your account or do not have a account and have a question or concern you are told to login to your account to ask it ... you can see how that could be a merry-go-round type issue.

title: First Bank
review: My come up hasn‚Äôt been the easiest. I haven‚Äôt had access to all the things I‚Äôve needed growing up but I didn‚Äôt let it stop me. Turning 18 this year I finally got my social security, i got my ID, and this is my first bank account! Having to figure out all this stuff on my own has not been easy, however Current has made my banking experience and my first tax experience easier than I could have ever imagined. So thank you. This is the start of my journey and you‚Äôre apart of it.

title: Security is a joke
review: Someone opened an account in my name, using my email address. I started getting emails about activating my debit card so I contacted them to let them know I had not opened an account. They responded that they had found the account in question and closed it and that any funds in the account would be sent, per check, to the address on file. I ask for the name and address on file so that I could file an Identity Theft complaint and they responded that for security reasons they couldn‚Äôt give me that info, I or the police would need to send them a subpoena. What a joke, their security is good enough to protect an Identity Thief but not good enough to keep one from opening an account. I would not recommend this app to anyone.

title: Don‚Äôt give u your money back
review: This company swears they protect your money but they don‚Äôt. I filed a dispute with lovely wholesale due to them saying they delivered my clothes but I never received anything. If u look at lovely wholesale reviews and bbb reviews they have done this to many customers. I filed the dispute in October it is now December and I still haven‚Äôt received any information or my funds back which is crazy. I have never had a bank take this long ever with the process. Then when I file the dispute with lovely wholesale all the say is they can issues a 20% discount. Current need a line where u can actually speak to the representatives cause emailing is pitiful and u don‚Äôt get an actual response about the dispute. Pitiful. Worst bank I have banked with.

title: Disappointed
review: I just started my account at the beginning of this month I changed my bank info right away here it is my pay day I still haven‚Äôt received my check the two days early pay is false advertising I should‚Äôve been received my money and there is no number to contact anybody they just have a program not that only answer certain questions I thought this would be better than my old bank card but I‚Äôm really frustrated about my money I have bill to pay so that is very inconvenient to me

title: Update phone information
review: I was skeptical after reading some reviews about the process some people went through to update phone number to log into account and how difficult it was to get in touch with customer support but honestly I‚Äôm so glad I did they got everything taken care of on my account in a very fast pace quicker than I thought it would be and they did everything to protect my account I‚Äôm very happy and satisfied with current

title: Not for self employed
review:
Wish I read reviews before opening this account I am self employed I get paid in check I have had the account 3 month haven‚Äôt made big deposit yet but the time i have made check deposit it said 3-5 days but I still waiting. They say you can get instant check deposit if you have a direct deposit but again I‚Äôm self employed I get paper checks and waiting a week to get paid is unnecessary if I can pay a fee and get it the same day I would like to use this account but they process checks like we live in the Stone Age it takes one day to process a check if that my old bank changed
 so I switch but if my account doesn‚Äôt work with the self employed I will not bank here.

title: Need major fixing!
review: This app has so many interesting features but it‚Äôs been almost two months since I opened my account ordered my card and I have not received a physical card. I reordered it already and it‚Äôs been 3 weeks since that and still no card... therefore I can‚Äôt withdrawal cash. I can only spend in places they accept Apple Cash.... and every time I talk to a customer service representative they just say the same thing. ‚Äú it‚Äôs says it‚Äôs ordered... sometimes it takes longer. I can go ahead and reorder another if you‚Äôd like.‚Äù And then they offered me express shipping for 20$ more, when I‚Äôve been waiting almost 2 months for my first card...

title: Terrible customer service
review: So I‚Äôve had current since I‚Äôm pretty sure 2018 I always get my checks direct deposited and my taxes it‚Äôs my main bank which really confuses me to why I don‚Äôt have overdrive I‚Äôve tried to contact customer service three different times the past few months and even tho I qualify for the overdrive feature and pay for premium they have to put me in for a review I‚Äôve had three different people tell me this and they say I‚Äôll get a email within 24-48 hours and I haven‚Äôt had one email or have tried to be reached out to I just don‚Äôt see why I pay for premium if I don‚Äôt get all the features. I‚Äôm almost about to switch to chime

title: Great but a major problem exists
review: I think the app is great! One problem I‚Äôm having is that every time I attempt to deposit funds from my funding source, the confirm button is greyed out and I can not deposit the funds. My bank account is a common checking account with Wellsfargo and it has funds in it and has been verified. I‚Äôve tried contacting support a few times and after waiting almost an hour to speak with someone on the chat function, they told me to uninstall and reinstall the app. Doing that did not work either. Didn‚Äôt want to have to go through the hassle of setting up with another company but that may be my only option.

title: Great service
review: My direct deposits always come 2-3 days early. The app is also great and easy to use. One nice thing is that it also has a virtual card that is attached to your account along with your plastic card. The virtual card has its own number. Over all very pleased with this bank. Do wish you was able to talk to a live person or was able to do more when you call the number off the card other then them telling you to go through the app.

title: Mistake
review:
My Daughter had signed up for this current app, but since she been lying about her age she didn‚Äôt know that minors can use current. Meanwhile, I was making a parent account on current since on the parent account you can track down what your kids been purchasing online, but since my daughter didn‚Äôt put her real age on her current account that she made separately. Is there a way that we can delete her account? 

Please contact me if there‚Äôs anyway she can delete account! :)

title: Recommend it!
review: It‚Äôs honestly great. Card came fast and it‚Äôs so cute. Options to make a savings pod and even monthly budgets by categories. Easy to transfer money back and fourth between accounts and you can make multiple accounts within the app and move around your money how you life. Also notifies me how much I spent and where and the amount I have left on my card which I love. Hooks up to all cash apps (cashapp, venmo, etc) I would for sure recommend it and I will continue to use it.

title: BEST APP EVER
review: I'm not gone lie guys, there was one issue i did have and it was the virtual card only. Somebody mistakenly had the same virtual card as me, but once i contacted them on the app in support they helped me QUICK. They always have the answers for you too let's not forget. They direct deposit works perfectly fine! I love this app so so so much it has helped me build and save. You can also do a joint account with your child if you have one. Just download for your experience cause please !

title: Perfect app for teen pocket money
review: I have been using this app to pay my son his pocket money for more than one year. We wanted to go cashless since this also much easier for him. Current is super easy to use, the app is very user friendly and beautifully designed and the whole transfer process is painless. I can schedule the payments to be automatic and he can request payments for other expenses. This is better than PayPal (which I have been using for my older daughter). I love it.

title: My Money was stolen thru the app
review: MY FIRST TIME GETTING MONEY DIRECT DEPOSITED INTO MY ACCOUNT FROM IRS WAS TAKEN OUT MY ACCOUNT 993 THE SAME DAY IT WAS DEPOSITED INTO MY ACCOUNT I CALLED THE NUMBER THEY GOT ON FILE WENT IN THE APP TO TALK TO THIER CUSTOMER SERVICE TO LET THEM KNOW MY MONEY WAS FRAUDULENT TAKEN WITHOUT MY CONSENT I DIDN'T EVEN KNOW THE PERSON DIDN'T KNOW HOW THEY PUT THIER SELF IN MY APP AS IF I SENT THE MONEY TO THEM AN I NEVER DID NEVER GAVE MY INFORMATION TO NO ONE TO EVEN GET IN MY ACCOUNT PERIOD AN I DID EVERYTHING I WAS TOLD TO DO AS FAR AS REPORTING THAT IT WAS AN FRAUDULENT ACTIVITY AND SOME ONE AS TAKEN MY MONEY THEY TOLD ME I COULD NOT TALK TO A HIGHER PERSON TO GET IT RESOLVED SO I KEPT TRYING TO TALK TO SOMEONE THEY KEPT TELLING ME THEY WILL SEND A FOLLOW UP EMAIL NEVER GOT IT SO I KEPT TRYING THEY TOLD ME IT TAKES 10 TO 90 DAYS FOR INVESTIGATION SO I WAS HEARING THAT BECAUSE SOMEONE TOOK MY MONEY WITH ME KNOWING AN I DONT I EVEN KNOW THE PERSON SO I KEPT TRYING TO TALK TO SOMEONE SO THE PERSON IN THE APP SENDS ME A EMAIL THAT I NEVER RECEIVE SAYING SOMETHING BOUT GIVING NOT GIVING MY INFORMATION OUT AN UNFORTUNATELY THEY CAN NOT CREDITED MY MONEY BACK INTO MY ACCOUNT!!!!!! THAT CRAZY BECAUSE I HAVE NO CLUE WHO THIS PERSON IS NEVER PUT THIS PERSON INTO MY ACCOUNT NEVER SENT THIS PERSON MY MONEY PERIOD AN I HAVE MORE MONEY COMING TO THIS ACCOUNT FROM THE IRS AN IM SCARED THEIR GOIN TO TAKE ME MONEY AGAIN!!!!!!

title: Deceitful and misleading
review:
So I tried this banking system out and it‚Äôs been nothing but misleading and unprofessional. 
I first signed up because of the overdraft system of 100. Only after u gave them money. Ok whatever. Then they promote with premium get paid two days early we‚Äôll guess what. Another example of dishonesty. I get my paystub Wednesday And the paystub is dated for Friday. My job sent u guys the funds. And I‚Äôm paying 5 bucks a month for u guys to ignore that date and pay me earlier. You didn‚Äôt do that and after further inquiry your support team pretty much said I have to wait anyway. And was also extremely rude. I have sreeanshots of the conversation along with my paystub that clear said they sent the funds to u guys two says early.

title: Linking a teen
review: Overall, the app works great. It has multiple features for saving and a button for if your child loses their card. The app is very helpful however the linking a teen option needs work. Although linking a teen is very helpful, you can not link them if they don‚Äôt have a phone number. Which means if your child doesn‚Äôt have a phone number, then they can not be linked. They can still use there account but they can easily transfer money from your account and change settings.

title: I LOVE THIS APP
review: As a high school student I‚Äôm not old enough to have my own bank account. This is really handy because I can make my own savings account, I got my own card and my parents can transfer money to me! It also shows you where and how much you spent at different stores! Overall the only thing I will say is that I wish you were able to make 2 different savings ( saving for a new car and saving for Christmas) other than that I‚Äôm in love with this app!

title: False Advertisement
review: They say if you have over $500/m in direct deposits you will have OverDrive. That is a complete lie. I‚Äôve had my account for probably two years now, with consistent direct deposits and still don‚Äôt have OverDrive. Customer Support is some of the worst I‚Äôve seen just give you generic *** answers that get you absolutely nowhere. I love the app and everything you guys just need to rehire your support team and not do false advertisement. I think it‚Äôs crazy I‚Äôve been a loyal customer for over 2 years and haven‚Äôt even been considered. Reached out about it to only get the answer that the ad says. So if your looking for overdraft definitely go with another bank because you‚Äôll never get OverDrive.

title: Great when it is working right
review: This has been perfect for my teens! It gives them independence with their money with oversight from mom. The problem is custom service is horrible. You cannot talk to anyone on the phone when you have an issue. Your only option is to communicate via chat with customer service through the app. AND then it takes forever to get them to understand what the problem is and then it usually ends up getting elevated so then you waits for days for communication via email. They do not link to all banks so it could be you can‚Äôt even use their service. It‚Äôs is a great convenience but needs ALOT of work!

title: I am marking it as 5 so you can see my comment
review: I want to place a complaint the person I spoke with in the chat was extremely rude, didn‚Äôt help me, and was a failure to my service. I ordered food off of Grubhub, they didn‚Äôt complete my order so they refunded my money. They told me the bank, Current, is denying the refund. And so I contacted the chat and was infuriated with the zero communication Joe had with me. He made rude remarks and ultimately failed at what I was requesting and refused to let me speak to his manager. I will also be figuring out who I can speak to, to report the ‚Äúbank‚Äù for basically stealing my hard earned money. What a horrible thing to do during a time like this when I am a single mother of two kids. Shame on this bank

title: Best App 4 Simple Direct Deposit
review: Current is one of the best apps I have ever used for direct deposit especially as a first time user. At first I was afraid I answered my information wrong but then I have received a notification when I woke up to go to work the next day kind of sad I didn‚Äôt get paid yet like they said I would one day earlier. Getting paid one day earlier is just what they promised and from now on I will be a current customer for life. Thank you Current!!!

title: Customer service is the worst
review: This rating really is more about the customer service than it is about the app. My request was simple. One I lost my card stolen not sure. I wanted to log into the app to report it however I did not have a current password. So I tried to reset my password and it would not except a password.I have sent a photo ID copy I have resubmitted all of my personal information at least three times, and I have exchanged over 30 emails and I still cannot log into my account. The emails are friendly enough, they just aren‚Äôt helpful now all I want to do is cancel my card and find something else to use that has helpful and useful customer service

title: Look No Further For Your Banking Needs
review: Living in a rural area banking is limited so I chose to use online banking and in doing so have had other cards with other institutions but never was quite satisfied‚Ä¶ that is until I got with Current. It is online banking at its finest and easiest with rewarding perks and wonderful customer services. So when your ready to bank with the best online banking service cut to the chase and go for the best CURRENT. I CAN PROMISE YOU THIS YOU WILL BE SO GLAD YOU DID AND WISH YOU WOULD OF SOONER.

title: So Far Really Good
review:
It‚Äôs like chime and Cash App put together.
Better benefits of chime and cash app. Free ATMs, Places to load you money on, direct deposit, checking and savings, add children, transfer and receive funds... I just need to see if I run into a problem how it handles it, but so far it checks out good. And less chances of fraud due to all the security checks. Only thing I didn‚Äôt see that I like about the cash app and chime is being able to lock your card from transactions.

title: I love this bank
review: I have had this bank for a while now and I have not ran into issues I love this bank better then chase and first convenience bank I closed my other bank accounts and stayed with this one. Not forgetting to mention you get paid faster with this one unlike chase promising you the same and still get paid fridays my check is supposed to be there on fridays and I get it on Tuesday yay!! The instant gas hold refunds are awesome, the fact that I have never had to pay a cent in overdraft fees is even more awesome! The pods do their job and that‚Äôs good enough for me. The only suggestion I have is work on the budgets, a lot of times it categorizes my stuff incorrectly but otherwise, stay awesome!

review:

It has been two months and my teen still cannot access their acct. There is no log in screen, it simply asks for a password and goes to a locked screen where you get stuck. We have emailed and i used the app for support. Support is slow and just repeats to delete and re-install the app, somehow a magic unicorn is supposed to touch the app and make it work. There are no unicorns near us to change the app into working. I can access the teen acct from my end, but they cannot.
Incredibly unhelpful and a waste of time.

title: Great App For Major Banking Alternate
review:
I have been looking around for a while for an app that I can use to replace my bank, which was charging fees left and right for everything I did. I found Current in an app store search and this is what I LOVE:

-Color scheme is amazing. Its a visually appealing app to use. I love the look of the debit card as well. Might be my favorite thing overall
-Built in tools like budgeting tracker is really cool
-i love the overdraft protection with no fees 
-I like that you can deposit cash still using stores in my area. Thats usually my only issue with non-major banking apps but this solves that issue
-Earning rewards points for shopping is always a plus
-Very nice to be able to use a virtual card until our real card gets here. 

I love the app and plan on using it long term!

title: I don‚Äôt trust
review:

I found this a little sus. So I called my financial agent sent my support chat to her. She said leave that bank immediately. A bank that does not accept federal check is not a real bank. To sum up. Use this bank at you own risk. And take in account a legal financial lawyer. Said do not trust this bank.
developerResponse:
{'id': 23203056, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review & we sincerely apologize for your experience with us. 

To clarify, we DO accept federal checks & any other personal checks that are made out to the account holder only.  However, if you were trying to fund your account for the first time with a check, we are unable to accept the check until you've made successful deposits from another funding source to your Current account. 

Once the deposits have settled into your account, the mobile check feature will be made available to you in the app. Please note, we only accept mobile check deposits up to $2000. 

If you have any other questions or concerns, please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account & we would be more than happy to assist you. ", 'modified': '2021-06-04T17:59:59Z'}

title: Love the app, but it does not work with iOS 14 as it claims
review:
Guys, get this: 

When I updated my phone to iOS 14, Current stopped working on my phone. It will not let me press the log in button to access my account, but I could still access my card. 

So, to try to solve the problem, I checked the update logs and they said that the app was updated to work with iOS 14. I just figured I needed to re-install the app. I did this, and I had the exact same problem. 

However, when I re installed the app, all of the previous data was deleted from the app, including my LOGIN INFO. So now I can‚Äôt even use my physical or virtual card at all! 

I do not recommend downloading the app or getting a card until this issue is resolved. I hope that the developers contact me about this issue before Current closes my account or something.

developerResponse:
{'id': 22986788, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review & we're terribly sorry for the inconvenience this has caused. 

It sounds like you may have had instant deposits enabled on your account which allowed you to instantly transfer money into your account & your teen accounts. However, we can temporarily disable instant deposits if we detect unusual activity on your account. 

When the instant deposits feature has been disabled on your account, your deposits will return to the standard timeframe of 1-3 business days to settle into your account. This is because we need to get confirmation from your bank that these funds are available and have fully cleared your account.

We understand how frustrating this can be & we'd be happy to further investigate this issue or address any questions/concerns you may have. Feel free to reach us at reviews@current.com from the email address associated with your account. 

Sincerely,
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-05-24T22:03:33Z'}

title: Constantly Bad
review:
I opened this account for my 16 year old daughter primarily because of the ‚ÄúNo Hidden Fees‚Äù promise.  I quickly discovered that the promise was nonsense.

1.  When I move money from my linked debit card to my Current account I am charged a fee.  Assuming of course the transaction processes.  More often than not there is an issue.
2.  Depositing a check via the app is mind numbingly slow.  Have had deposits take 8 business days.  These were payroll checks from a huge retail clothing company.
3.  Whenever we have had an issue it is always someone else‚Äôs fault.

Pull your head out.

title: Works... mostly
review:
To;dr - use a real bank for check deposits 

App is ok, though a bit funky to navigate. I‚Äôve been using with two teenagers for 6 months, and I still get lost in navigating screens. 

Forget about customer service, if you have a problem, though. You have to threaten to quit the service to get anything more than a re-read of the FAQ. 

My son started working. Got a work check, from a US bank, made out in his name. They rejected the check. Which is no fun, since you have to endorse to ‚ÄúCurrent‚Äù.

They cited the FAQ, for the rejection, but it didn‚Äôt make sense.

Disappointing

title: False Advertisement
review:
Love ads (seen within five minutes) promise 4% APY on savings account if you add your phone number to wait list. No fine print anywhere. No details.

After adding your number you‚Äôll get a text saying ‚Äúdownload the current app‚Äù with an App Store or google play link.

After signing up for an account you‚Äôll find that the savings account they‚Äôre toting doesn‚Äôt exist.

Deceptive and manipulative marketing tactics aren‚Äôt a great start to a financial partnership.

Way better options out there.

Edit: they assume I‚Äôm talking about a check still that mysteriously can get processed because of their weird procedure and refuse to help me with it and act like they can‚Äôt tell me why I can‚Äôt cash a check that‚Äôs payrolled through ADP I already emailed the dang email and it literally says the exact same thing as the this developer note i literally did all the things they keep repeating over and over ‚Äúadd a band blah blah blah‚Äù but it‚Äôs my bad for being too eager and cashing a check through them they still owe me a $36 refund that they were so quick to take for the teen banking account which was supposed to be taken out that account but taken of another card that was connected to the admin account and when I asked for a refund they said oh yeah and ten weeks later never refunded the money, but again my bad for being to quick and downloading random app ü§∑üèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è, and I‚Äôm talking bout the hundreds of reviews saying money is either being taken out the account or the accounts being locked and or someone is accessing their accounts and is taking money out for the Little Developer note they keep leaving. 5 stars so people can avoid the problems that are happening that they drown out in these 5 star reviews üëçüèøüëçüèøüëçüèøüëçüèø.
